name: Boris Yeltsin
bio: President of Russia. Leading the charge for democracy & progress. Committed to building a brighter future for all Russians. #YeltsinForChange

name: Cornel West
bio: Activist, author, and philosopher spreading truth and promoting justice in a world gone mad. #StayWoke

name: Liz Phair
bio: im Liz Phair!! singer, song-writer, feminist. i say what i freakin think! XOxo

name: Camille Paglia
bio: Provocative post-structural cultural theorist taking on gender, politics, and culture with a fierce pen. Author of "Sexual Personae".

name: Terence McKenna
bio: Ethnobotanist exploring the fringes of consciousness and culture. Author of "True Hallucinations" and "The Archaic Revival".
